h1: How Many Calories Are in New York Strip Steak?

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz grilled New York strip steak provides ~615 kcal and ~59 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an 8 oz New York strip steak?
faqs.a: About 615 kcal for an 8 oz grilled steak with lean and fat.

faqs.q: What's the protein in New York strip steak?
faqs.a: One 8 oz serving has ~59 g protein, great for muscle building.

faqs.q: Does New York strip steak have carbs?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugars—it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in New York strip steak?
faqs.a: Grilling keeps it lower; frying or adding fats increases by 40–100 kcal per serving.

faqs.q: Is New York strip steak high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~17 g saturated fat per 8 oz due to marbling; opt for lean cuts to reduce.
